llm_prompt_template: The following is the Freshwater Farm Plan risk assessment matrix used for Southland context, including catchment context modifiers. Given the farm’s location, land use, and catchment context, assess each relevant risk factor by assigning a likelihood score (1–5) and a consequence score (1–5). Apply any catchment context modifiers to adjust the consequence score before calculating the final risk category using the matrix. Recommend actions based on the category. Use the provided risk factors, categories, and modifiers as your reference.
